metadata.description: A project roadmap managed by Project Roadmap Tracking

tasks.details: implement the add command to be able to add tasks to the prt.json from the command line
tasks.title: Add command

tasks.details: Publish the project-roadmap-tracking package to the NPM registry to make it publicly available for installation

tasks.details: Install project-roadmap-tracking globally via npm to make the prt command available system-wide for all projects
tasks.title: Install PRT globally

tasks.details: Create and configure a PRT skill integration for Claude Code to enable AI-assisted project roadmap management through natural language commands
tasks.title: Add PRT skill to Claude
